title: Biosecurity for Transporting Livestock and Poultry for Owners

tasks.task: Designate secure entry point for vehicles.
subtasks: Post admittance phone number.
Inspect entry vehicles for dirt or manure.
Require cleaning of dirty equipment or provide facilities.
Log vehicle entry details.

tasks.task: Prepare documentation checks for animal transport.
subtasks: Verify certificate of veterinary inspection (CVI) before loading.
Check for certificate of brand inspection if applicable.
Confirm bill of lading details.
Validate bill of sale if needed.
Ensure cleanouts are closed on trailers.
Inspect bedding materials for hygiene.
Monitor animal health during loading.
Quarantine sick or injured animals.
Track number and classes of loaded animals.
Recheck paperwork after unloading.
Evaluate new animals for signs of illness.
Quarantine new animals as recommended by vet.
Provide fresh water and feed for new animals.
Request transporter to clean equipment post-unloading.
Maintain clean and quarantine areas.
Follow up animal health protocols for new arrivals.

tasks.task: Designate a secure entry point for incoming vehicles.
subtasks: Post a contact phone number.
Inspect vehicles and direct cleaning if necessary.
Log entry details including condition and contact information.
Check for a certificate of veterinary inspection (CVI).
Validate certificate of brand inspection if needed.
Confirm bill of lading details.
Ensure a bill of sale is provided if applicable.
Inspect cleanouts on trailers.
Check and replace bedding materials.
Monitor animal health during loading.
Quarantine sick or injured animals.
Track the number and classes of loaded animals.
Verify post-unloading paperwork.
Evaluate new animals for signs of illness.
Quarantine new animals as per vet advice.
Ensure new animals have water and feed.
Request transporters to clean equipment.
Keep quarantine areas prepared.
Follow-up on animal health protocols for new arrivals.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Inspect and manage vehicle entry.
subtasks: Designate a secure single entry point.
Post phone number for admittance.
Inspect vehicles entering for signs of contamination.
Require cleaning of dirty or contaminated vehicles.
Keep a detailed log of all entries, including vehicle conditions.
Allow only trusted vehicles or inspect them thoroughly.
Verify certificates of veterinary inspection (CVI) before loading.
Confirm brand inspection certificates for cattle.
Check bills of lading for transport details.
Validate bills of sale if applicable.
Inspect trailers' cleanliness during loading.
Ensure fresh bedding materials.
Monitor animal health during loading and quarantine sick ones.
Document the number and types of animals loaded.
Recheck transportation documentation after unloading.
Examine new animals for signs of illness.
Set up quarantine for new animals if needed.
Provide fresh water and feed to new arrivals.
Encourage transporters to clean equipment thoroughly after use.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Secure entry for vehicles transporting livestock and poultry.
subtasks: Post a clear admittance phone number.
Inspect each incoming vehicle for dirt or manure.
Clean or direct vehicles for cleaning if necessary.
Log all vehicle entries with contact details.
Admit only trusted vehicles or inspect them before entry.
Check for a certificate of veterinary inspection (CVI).
Confirm a certificate of brand inspection if required for cattle.
Validate the bill of lading details.
Ensure a bill of sale if animals are being sold.
Ensure cleanouts are closed on trailers.
Inspect and replace bedding if necessary.
Examine animals during loading and keep sick/injured in quarantine.
Log the number and classes of loaded animals.
Recheck transport documents after unloading.
Evaluate new animals for signs/symptoms of disease.
Isolate any sick animals immediately.
Set up quarantine area if needed and follow vet advice.
Provide water and feed for new animals.
Request transporters to clean their equipment post-unload.
Keep prepared quarantine areas.
Follow up on health protocols for new arrivals.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Secure vehicle entry and inspect for contamination.
subtasks: Designate a single entry point.
Post a contact phone number.
Inspect incoming vehicles; require cleaning if dirty.
Log entry details.
Check CVI and brand inspection certificates.
Confirm bills of lading and sale documents as needed.
Inspect cleanouts on trailers.
Ensure fresh bedding and appropriate coverage.
Monitor animal health during loading; isolate sick or injured.
Record loaded animals by type and count.
Verify transport documents again.
Check new animals for illnesses.
Quarantine suspicious animals.
Provide water and feed.
Request transporters to clean their vehicles post-use.
Prepare quarantine areas.
Follow up on health of new animals.
